text: "I Married Marge" is the twelfth episode of The Simpsons third season. It first started on the Fox network in the United States on December 26, 1991. In this episode, Marge worries that she may yet again be pregnant and drives to "Dr. Hibbert's" office. While anxiously waiting, Homer begins to tell Bart, Lisa, and Maggie the story of how he and Marge got married and how Bart was born. == Other websites == * * * Category:1991 television episodes Category:The Simpsons (season 3) episodes Category:Television episodes about marriage
title: I Married Marge
